basics.name: Yonghyeon Jung / Terry Jung
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am the Android developer who has developed good quality and user friendly software. and i am interested in new technology, I like to try new technology in many ways

highlights: Writing and translation about technical white paper
Design mobile client architecture and develop

work.summary: Developed Android framework and application/SDK within Samsung Galaxy Flagship Devices.
highlights: Developed 2nd party application based on edge screen framework. Yahoo YQL, Kakao, Naver, and Twitter are API-based applications that use a lot of network, but because of the environment that can not use other licenses library, I used Volley built in Android Framework.
Improved the performance after analysis through the application profiling of the setting or view in the edge screen framework. As UI / UX changed, I was responsible for the GUI operation of the app.

Improved the structure for Samsung Galaxy Smart Cover SDK and Framework . i was responsible for API development between SDK and Framework, structure improvement, and interworking with other applications. i have improved the performance of Window Layers and View
